Sentence: Since 2017
column4: Ronaldo adapted his style of play yet again to become more of a free roaming centre forward under manager Zinedine Zidane
column5: a role in which he continued to excel and maintain a prolific goalscoring record; in this position
column6: he earned praise in media for his intelligent movement both on and off ball
column7: positional sense
column8: link up play and finishing
column9: as well as his ability to lose or anticipate his markers
column10: find space in box and score from few touches or opportunities.
